content: निवर्तन {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Causing to return. {@--2@} Turning back, ceasing. --नं {@--1@} Returning, turning or coming back, return; इह हि पततां नास्त्यालंबो न चापि निवर्तनं <ls>Śānti. 3. 2.</ls> {@--2@} Not happening, ceasing. {@--3@} Desisting or abstaining from (with <ab>abl.</ab>). {@--4@} Desisting from work, inactivity (<ab>opp.</ab> प्रवर्तन); <ls>Kām. 1. 28.</ls> {@--5@} Bringing back; <ls>Amaru. 84.</ls> {@--6@} Repenting, a desire to improve. {@--7@} A measure of land (20 rods). {@--8@} Keeping back from (with <ab>abl.</ab>).
